metadata.name: Holy Trash Plastics ®
metadata.description:
Microplastics have turned up in every corner of the planet; in the water we drink and in the air we breathe. Single use plastics issue is larger than just trash piling up around.

The Holy Trash shrines acknowledge the sick dependency between us and one of our worst problems.

Single use plastics, a mankind's glitch.

What once made our life more comfortable, will become part of us. Microplastics.

>Holy Trash is an NFT generated by damian : 大面 in 2021. Created to be printed in the exclusive Shanghai based Art-Zine 'Plusminus PRETTY UGLY'.
